dialogs_chapter_2_Надо попробовать снова: I must try to contact Irey again.

Unfortunately no\..\..\..
But I found the room where he was looking for 
something.
dialogs_chapter_2_Среди инструментов на:
Among the instruments on the first floor there would

dialogs_chapter_2_Эх\\..\\..\\.. Прости,:
Eh\..\..\.. Sorry, Ri\..\.. I'll talk for now
with your comrade, and you continue your search!
dialogs_chapter_2_И остор\\..\\..\\.., н:
And be care\..\..\.., there are a lot of\..\..\.. on the

dialogs_chapter_2_Не нравится мне это ме:
I don't like this place\..\..\..
I need to quickly find Weiler and get out of here!
dialogs_chapter_2_Тут бояться нечего!: There is nothing to be afraid of!
dialogs_chapter_2_Дверь заклинило... \\!:
The door is jammed... \!All hope is for the "attack" 
ingot.\! With its help you can unlock the door if its 
mechanisms safe\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Слиток атаки временно:
The Attack Ingot temporarily increases the 
Reaper's strength. With its help you can overcome 
most physical barriers.
dialogs_chapter_2_Без усиления слитка ат:
I can't open it without strengthening the attack 
ingot!
dialogs_chapter_2_Возможно, рычаг в комн: Perhaps a lever in a cluttered room opens it.
dialogs_chapter_2_Возможно, он открывает: Perhaps it opens the door to the next level.
dialogs_chapter_2_Держись, Вейлер. Скоро: Hang in there, Weiler. I'll get you out of here soon.
dialogs_chapter_2_Нужно найти цельную ос: We need to find a solid foundation.
dialogs_chapter_2_Охранные системы подзе: Security systems of the underground building\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Надеюсь, Ирей оставил:
I hope Irey left the deactivation lever\..\..\..
in case of emergency!
dialogs_chapter_2_Вот она, нужная деталь: Here it is, the necessary detail!
dialogs_chapter_2_Пора вернуться к панел: Time to get back to the control panel!
dialogs_chapter_2_Спокойно, чувак!\\. Я: Calm down, dude!\. I’m one of you!\.
dialogs_chapter_2_Предлагаю рвануть отсю: I suggest you get out of here as fast as you can!
I have tried\..\..\..
This creature will follow us everywhere!
dialogs_chapter_2_Не расскажешь, кто охо: Can you tell me who is hunting us?
dialogs_chapter_2_Его имя\\..\\..\\.. Ко:
His name\..\..\.. Nightmare!\.
One of the 12 Judges\..\..\.. Judges who are almost 
completely destroyed Paradise, killed most of Hell 
and killed \c[18]Death\c[0]\..\..\.. in her physical body.
dialogs_chapter_2_Чего?!\\.\\.\\! И один:
What?!\.\.\!
And one of these monsters is hunting us?
dialogs_chapter_2_Не уверен, он ли это\\:
I'm not sure if it's him\..\..\..
But it looks similar.
dialogs_chapter_2_Понятно\\..\\..\\.. Ду:
It's clear\..\..\.. I think it’s better to ask Irey such 
questions when we return.
dialogs_chapter_2_Не преувеличивай!\\. О:
Do not exaggerate!\. He doesn’t want to kill us, 
otherwise he would have done it long ago!
dialogs_chapter_2_Его появление вызывает:
His appearance causes a technical failure\..\..\..
We must be on our guard!
dialogs_chapter_2_Рычагов отключения не:
The shutdown levers are not visible\..\..\..\| I will 
have to damage 4 power supply rod!
dialogs_chapter_2_Слиток защиты временно:
The Defense Ingot temporarily increases the 
Reaper's defense. It can be used to reduce damage 
from traps.
dialogs_chapter_2_Очень полезный модуль,:
A very useful module, protects against magical 
attacks, or flows of magic\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Стоит надеть его перед:
It's worth putting it on before entering a room with 
militia fumes!
dialogs_chapter_2_Ты в медицинском корпу:
You're in the medical building.
They brought you here a couple of hours ago.
dialogs_chapter_2_Где я? Что это за мест: Where am I? What kind of place is it?
dialogs_chapter_2_Мы находимся в центре: We are located in the center of the medical building.
dialogs_chapter_2_После первой войны Ада:
After the first Adamant War, this building
suffered greatly. \!
But after a couple of years, it was restored and
expanded.
dialogs_chapter_2_Что со мной произошло?:
What happened to me?
Recently I was at the headquarters of the punitive 
forces.
dialogs_chapter_2_Не знаю всех деталей\\: I don’t know all the details\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Тебя принесли закованн:
They brought you chained in a pyrite sarcophagus.
And when they put you in the intensive care unit\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Ты бился в конвульсиях:
You were convulsing, and cuts were constantly 
appearing on your body.
\!We barely managed to save you.
dialogs_chapter_2_Я расспрашивала карате:
I asked the punishers about this.\!
But Ricard ordered them to remain silent and 
do everything so that you don't die\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Хреново. Меня словно к:
I feel terrible.. It’s like I was run over by a chariot.
My whole body hurts\..\..\..
There are no wounds, \.bones, \.muscles, \.organs\..\..\.. 
everything is intact.
dialogs_chapter_2_Похоже твоя нервная си:
It looks like your nervous system is severely 
damaged.
dialogs_chapter_2_Рита достает голографи:
Rita takes out a holographic tablet and points the 
screen at Riom.
dialogs_chapter_2_Что они с тобой сделал: What did they do to you?
dialogs_chapter_2_Мне выдали особый меч:
I was given a special sword, Genom Morkret, and 
I tried taking possession of it.
dialogs_chapter_2_Ты что-то о нем знаешь: Do you know something about him?\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Только то, что у этого:
Only that this blade had three
owners and all died very quickly. \.
Not even a year has passed.
dialogs_chapter_2_Если верить информации:
According to information from Ricard, now you
are the fourth owner of this sword.
dialogs_chapter_2_Спасибо\\..\\..\\.. Бу: Thank you\..\..\.. I'll be careful with him.
dialogs_chapter_2_И ещё, Рикард приказал:
And also, Ricard ordered you to return to 
headquarters when you get better.
Out of the frying pan into the fire\..\..\.. \!
Okay, I'll be right there.
dialogs_chapter_2_Мышцы и кости у тебя с:
Your muscles and bones have grown together, but
you are not healthy enough yet!
dialogs_chapter_2_Слушай, злить Рикарда:
Listen, making Ricard angry by being late is a bad 
idea. I’ve already offended him several times.
dialogs_chapter_2_Замечания и упреки мож:
Remarks and reproaches can be survived.
But I want to get a hat from Ricard
No.
dialogs_chapter_2_Понимаю\\..\\..\\.. но:
I understand\..\..\.. but you also should understand 
something. The nervous system cannot be
healed without outside help.
dialogs_chapter_2_Такие раны подобно рак:
Such wounds are like a cancerous tumor - they will 
begin devour you from the inside.
dialogs_chapter_2_Так что, перед возвращ:
So, before returning to your headquarters, you need
to come to my laboratory.
dialogs_chapter_2_И спасибо за то, что с:
And thank you for saving me.
If it weren't for you and Kenchiru, I wouldn't be here\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Т-так. Зачем мы сюда п: S-so. Why did we c-come here?
dialogs_chapter_2_Наш отряд, корпус всег:
Our detachment, the corps, has always served 
faithfully to Mrs. D-death!\. But LAURITA!
dialogs_chapter_2_Лаурита!\\.\\. Эта выс:
Laurita!\.\. This arrogant girl never missed a chance
to laugh at our corps!
dialogs_chapter_2_И-и что ты собираешься: A-and what are you going to do?
dialogs_chapter_2_МЫ!\\.\\. Нашему корпу:
WE!\.\.
Our corps needs 4 personal relics of battle reapers.\.\.
The first one is somewhere in the v-v-vault\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Вторая - в общежитии.\:
The second is in the hostel.\.
The third is somewhere in Ricard's office.\.
And the fourth - you, Riom, will swipe from Laurita.
dialogs_chapter_2_Нежное,\\. шелковистое:
Tender,\. silky,\. soft,\. hidden in one of a thousand
chests.\. Laurita wears them only in moonlight among
stars before plunging into the endless sea.
... I'm sure\..\..\.. It's in her room.\.
Come on, Riom, don't waste time! Corridor\..\..\.. 
straight\..\..\.. and somewhere left\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Я пока присмотрю за ре:
I'll look after the guys for now, and you look for the 
relic\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Так\\..\\..\\.. я долж: So\..\..\.. I have to find the relic\..\..\..
I feel bad\..\..\.. where is the toilet?
dialogs_chapter_2_НЕТ! ИРНИ!\\.\\. Тут н:
NO! IRNIE!\.\.
There are no toilets anywhere!
dialogs_chapter_2_Давай в один из ящиков:
Let's go to one of the boxes! So at least it won’t be 
visible!
dialogs_chapter_2_Рутгер, держи его голо: Rutger, hold his head! Hiflok, open the drawer!
dialogs_chapter_2_Пожалуй, мне пора\\..\: I guess it's time for me\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Сейчас не стоит туда и: It's not worth going there now.
dialogs_chapter_2_А какой смысл возвраща: What's the point of coming back?!

*Riom is in a hurry to meet Rosie in
                                    northeastern region of Purgatory*
dialogs_chapter_2_Наверно та, к-которая: Probably the one on the left is the one I need!
dialogs_chapter_2_Мне не удалось получит:
I was unable to obtain the relic\..\..\..
I hope this doesn’t upset Irny\..\..\..
I need to find him!
dialogs_chapter_2_Сверху много одежды, а:
There are a lot of clothes on top, and in drawers 
below...
dialogs_chapter_2_Я п-понял, э-это её ли: I u-understood, th-this is her personal w-wardrobe...
dialogs_chapter_2_Так\\..\\..\\.. Призна:
So\..\..\.. There are no signs of a mechanical lock,
It means sealed with magic.
dialogs_chapter_2_Грубой силой мне его н: I can't open it with brute force.
dialogs_chapter_2_Здесь замок, магически: There is a lock here, magical.
dialogs_chapter_2_Попытка не пытка!\\. И: An attempt is not torture!\. And again!
dialogs_chapter_2_Не поддалась\\..\\..\\:
I didn't give in\..\..\..
It was the only spell I knew
to remove seals.
dialogs_chapter_2_Надо бы убедиться, пре:
I need to make sure before I start searching
for the relic.
dialogs_chapter_2_Что ж\\..\\..\\.. рели: Well\..\..\.. I have a relic, but...
dialogs_chapter_2_... она совсем не подх: ...it doesn't fit Irni's description at all.
dialogs_chapter_2_Надеюсь, он ничего не: I hope he doesn't notice anything!
dialogs_chapter_2_Не люблю я, когда мне: I don't like when people ask me questions.
dialogs_chapter_2_На столе открытая книг:
There's an open book on the table\..\..\..
"A letter from my beloved."
Some kind of women's novel.
dialogs_chapter_2_\"Письмо от моего люби:
"A letter from my beloved."
Some kind of love story.
dialogs_chapter_2_На столе лежат две отк:

Both for Laurita!
dialogs_chapter_2_Эти шкафы передо мной:
These cabinets in front of me are a good place 
to hide relic!
dialogs_chapter_2_На столе лежат две отк: There are two postcards on the table.
There are a lot of papers on the table.
dialogs_chapter_2_Здесь есть письмо\\..\:
There is a letter here\..\..\..
And it’s for Laurita!
dialogs_chapter_2_Замок\\..\\..\\.. немн:
Turn the lock\..\..\.. a little\..\..\.. tug the door slightly\..\..\..
and the way is clear.
dialogs_chapter_2_Не хочу сейчас видеть: I don’t want to see Laurita now.
dialogs_chapter_2_Чёрт! Должно быть Лаур:
Damn! It must be Laurita\..\..\..
What a bad time. I need to hide urgently.
dialogs_chapter_2_Кто бы ты не был лучше:
Whoever you are, better come out yourself. 
Otherwise\..\..\.. It's worse for you.
dialogs_chapter_2_Ладно\\..\\..\\.. Види: Okay\..\..\.. Apparently, there is no one here.
dialogs_chapter_2_Вау\\..\\..\\.. Это, к:
Wow\..\..\.. This is certainly not a maid at the court
 of the King of England\..\..\.. But it's also good.
dialogs_chapter_2_Не нужно прятаться, Ри: No need to hide, Riom Ruri!
dialogs_chapter_2_Что это за волшебный ш: What kind of magic wardrobe is this?
dialogs_chapter_2_Не против, если я сост: Do you mind if I keep you company?
dialogs_chapter_2_Телепорт в небольшой м:
Teleport to a small world isolated from Purgatory.\.
This is a gift for faithful service to Lady \C[10]Death\C[0].\.
In this closet I can recreate any place from the world
of the Living and enjoy it\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Почему бы для этого не: Why not go down to the human world for this?
dialogs_chapter_2_Из-за постоянной работ:
Due to the constant work of organizing tasks for
reapers of lower rank.
dialogs_chapter_2_Только после долгой сл:
Only after a long service or\..\..\..
accomplishment of the feat, the Werolomger can

dialogs_chapter_2_И какое место ты бы хо: And what place would you like to visit?
Mountains.\. Cold.\. Covered with ice and snow.\.
I really want to see the green glow with my own 
eyes, against the backdrop of a sky clear of 
clouds\..\..\.. strewn with bright stars.
dialogs_chapter_2_Ха-ха-ха! Ты льстишь м: Ha ha ha! You flatter me!
dialogs_chapter_2_Но нет\\..\\..\\.. Я м:
But no\..\..\.. I can afford to create a territory
the size of this lake.\. No more.\. I am far from 
the power of the Hierarchs, like Irey.
dialogs_chapter_2_Хммм\\..\\..\\.. Раз т:
Hmmm\..\..\.. Since you came, why not\..\..\..
Just for starters\..\..\.. Take off your clothes!
dialogs_chapter_2_*Риом начал с плаща, н:
*Riom started with the cloak, but the clothes 
                                                    did not budge*
dialogs_chapter_2_Лаурита, может я так в: Laurita, maybe I’ll dive into the lake like this?
dialogs_chapter_2_Что же\\..\\..\\.. Моя: Well\..\..\.. It’s my turn to ask questions.
dialogs_chapter_2_Зачем ты пробрался в м: Why did you sneak into my room?
dialogs_chapter_2_Мне нужна реликвия кор: I need a relic of the Battle Reaper Corps\..\..\.. your panties.
dialogs_chapter_2_*Лаурита вогнала меч в: *Laurita drove the sword into the ground*
dialogs_chapter_2_Подобно ледяной буре с: Like an ice storm that demolishes mountains\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Ой\\..\\..\\.. Тут так: Oh\..\..\.. This is the case here!
dialogs_chapter_2_Меня перевели в карате:
I was transferred to the punitive corps, and now I am 
undergoing one very serious ritual\..\..\.. initiation.
dialogs_chapter_2_Ох\\..\\..\\.. Опять э:
Oh\..\..\.. Again these idiots for their own\..\..\..
And what does Irni want to take away this time?
dialogs_chapter_2_Одну из реликвий боевы: One of the relics of the battle reapers
dialogs_chapter_2_Одну из реликвий твоег:
One of the relics of your corps\..\..\.. Irni, I'm sure 
this is something from your private room.
dialogs_chapter_2_Вот же мелкий проказни:
What a little prankster\..\..\.. It's time to stop him
drinking in taverns.
dialogs_chapter_2_*Лаурита срывает с себ: *Laurita rips off her right shoulder pad*
dialogs_chapter_2_Боль\\..\\..\\.. Давно: Pain\..\..\.. I haven’t heard this word for a long time\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_*Лаурита накрасила губ: *Laurita applied lipstick to her lips with a bloody finger*
dialogs_chapter_2_*А после передала Риом:
*And then she handed Riom a shoulder pad 
                                        with the imprint of her lips*
dialogs_chapter_2_Это одна из реликвий.\:
This is one of the relics.\. And I hope this is the last time,
when his squad poked his head into my building\..\..\.. 
without permission.
dialogs_chapter_2_*Лаурита приложила ото:
*Laurita put the severed finger in place and treated
                                     wound with a healing ray.*
dialogs_chapter_2_Риом, меня слышно?! Эт:
Riom, can you hear me?! It's Rose!\.
Riom, please hurry up! We have a problem\..\..\..
Approach the dorm next to the equipment depot in
North-Eastern region.
dialogs_chapter_2_Приятно было пообщатьс:
It was nice talking to you, Riom Ruri!\.
Let everything that happened here remain between 
us.
dialogs_chapter_2_Ха-ха! Конечно!\\! Куд:
Haha of course!\!
Where can you get away from Purgatory?!
dialogs_chapter_2_Ирни\\..\\..\\.. Снача:
Irni\..\..\.. First he vomited in the storeroom of the 
Combat reapers building, and after\..\..\.. he couldn’t 
put two words together!
dialogs_chapter_2_Его через каждые 5 мин:
He feels sick every 5 minutes.\.
There aren’t many boxes here!
dialogs_chapter_2_С-слуш-а-ай, леди Роза: S-listen, Lady Rose, I have an idea.
dialogs_chapter_2_... пойдём укроемся гд:
...will go and hide somewhere in the dormitory. And 
you...
dialogs_chapter_2_Тебя то хоть в сон не: Doesn't it at least make you sleepy?
dialogs_chapter_2_Чёрт! Рикард нам всем: Crap! Ricard is tearing our heads off!
dialogs_chapter_2_Сомневаюсь, что ему эт: I doubt he will be allowed to do this.
dialogs_chapter_2_Открыто не позволят, н:
They won’t allow it openly, but if he wants, he’ll 
remove anyone, who didn't please him.
dialogs_chapter_2_Где спальни Ирни и Хиф: Where are Irni and Heeflock's bedrooms?
dialogs_chapter_2_... в восточном районе: ... in the eastern area, next to the Irey lecture hall.
dialogs_chapter_2_Комната Ирни находится:
Irni's room is located in the headquarters of the 
Punitive Corps!
dialogs_chapter_2_Ладно. Я незаметно дон:
Okay. I'll quietly carry Irni to his bedroom, and 
Rutger will carry Hiflock.
dialogs_chapter_2_Хорошо\\..\\..\\..Толь: Okay\..\..\..Just don’t get caught by the patrols!
dialogs_chapter_2_Тут т-такое дело\\..\\:
Here's the thing\..\..\.. We overdid it with booze and 
now\..\..\..
I see you're in a hurry\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Будь осторожен, сейчас:
Be careful, there are a lot of
combat reapers together with punishers. \|
Stay close to the Rivalsers, none of them
are eager to rat you out.
dialogs_chapter_2_Нет-нет-нет, не в обще:
No, no, no, not to the dorm!\.
Irni's room in the punitive building of the Southern 
region.
dialogs_chapter_2_Сначала отнесу Ирни в: First, I’ll take Irny to his room.
dialogs_chapter_2_Ирни\\..\\..\\.. опять:
Irni\..\..\.. you’re at it again.\. 
Well, at least it’s not Lady Rose who’s dragging you, 
it’s something new.
dialogs_chapter_2_Мру\\..\\..\\.. Т-ты\\:
Meow\..\..\.. Y-you\..\..\.. s-stop it\..\..\.. W-why do you 
g-give it away\..\..\.. A?
dialogs_chapter_2_*Ирни что-то пытается:
*Irni tries to say something, but Riom
                           interrupted his speech with a blow to his head*
dialogs_chapter_2_\\C[1]У Ирни всегда та: \C[1]Is Irni always like this during the initiation?
dialogs_chapter_2_У Ирни всегда так с по: Is Irni always like this during the initiation?
dialogs_chapter_2_Хе-хе.\\.\\. По-разном:
Hehe.\.\. In different ways.\.
It depends on two things: the newbie's persona
and the amount of alcohol consumed.
dialogs_chapter_2_Если это какой-то непр:
If this is some unremarkable reaper -
then everything costs 1-2 liters.
dialogs_chapter_2_В ином случае - как с: Otherwise, like with Lady Rose, or like now.
dialogs_chapter_2_Она, Ирни, Хифлок и Ру:
She, Irni, Heeflock and Rutger dressed in village 
clothes and went on a drinking spree with the 
people of Denmark. After this Irni proposed to 
launch a raid on a port in England.
dialogs_chapter_2_Сам он, разумеется, не:
He himself, of course, did not participate. 
He fell from the drakkar, and the detachment 
searched for him throughout Denmark.
dialogs_chapter_2_Оказалось, что течение:
It turned out that the river current threw Irni onto the 
land Holy Roman Empire. There the detachment 
continued dedication. This time during the king's feast.
dialogs_chapter_2_Ирни с отрядом переоде:
Irni and his squad dressed up in noble clothes.
Rose even danced with the king, spun such a
hopak that at the end her head fell on the bench.
dialogs_chapter_2_Сама леди не пострадал:
The lady herself was not injured, but the bench was 
split in half...
It was fun\..\..\.. It’s a pity that Ricard found out about 
everything.
dialogs_chapter_2_Ха-ха! Хороший вопрос!: Ha ha! Good question! Keep it stunning!
dialogs_chapter_2_*Охранник кидает Риому: *The guard throws a stun ingot into Riom's hands*
dialogs_chapter_2_А теперь врежь ему сли: Now hit him right on the head with the ingot!
dialogs_chapter_2_*Риом применил слиток: *Riom used the ingot for its intended purpose*
Universal method. Works flawlessly as
watch!
dialogs_chapter_2_Скажи, где его комната: Tell me where is his room?
dialogs_chapter_2_Там же, где вы дружно:
In the same place where you began the initiation
together.
dialogs_chapter_2_И ещё одно.\\. В пусты:
One more thing.\.
In the desert we noticed some movement towards 
Purgatory.\. The Corps of Punishers and Battle 
Reapers are on edge.
dialogs_chapter_2_Так что осторожнее, се: So be careful, the corridors are crowded now.
Well, here we are\..\..\.. So, where should I take you?
dialogs_chapter_2_Если это комната Ирни,: If this is Irni's room, then there should be a bed here\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_*Рядом с дверью слышны: *Two voices are heard near the door*
dialogs_chapter_2_В комнате Мерсалесса с: Did you look in Mersaless's room?
dialogs_chapter_2_Генри, отбери 30-40 са:
Henry, select 30-40 of the worst fighters and 
give each one a protective module. 
It will be a shame if they die too quickly.
dialogs_chapter_2_Но, командир\\..\\..\\:
But, commander\..\..\.. There will be more than 
a couple hundred Risens\..\..\.. 
Maybe it’s better to gather a stronger detachment?
dialogs_chapter_2_И чем тогда Влур-Стига:
And then what to beat Vlur-Stig with?\.\.
The remnants of those who know how to fight?
dialogs_chapter_2_Нет.\\. В худшем случа:
No.\. In the worst case, we will find out how large
an army Adamant was able to create.\. 
Otherwise, we will be able to kill everyone with
a small army\..\..\.. before they appear in Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_2_Кстати, надо проверить:
By the way, we need to check where Irni hangs 
around.
dialogs_chapter_2_Что?\\..\\.. Он замети:
What?\..\.. Did he notice?\..\.. Damn, I think I’ve had 
too much\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_*Риом пролежал в шкафу: *Riom lays in the closet for several hours*
dialogs_chapter_2_Точняк! Я же в шкафу п: Exactly! I was hiding from Ricard in the closet!
dialogs_chapter_2_Без паники, Ирни, всё: Don't panic, Irni, everything is fine!
dialogs_chapter_2_Риом!\\. Я так рада те: Riom!\. I am so glad to see you!
dialogs_chapter_2_Роза, спасай!\\. Меня:
Rose, save me!\. They walled me up and want to kill 
me!
dialogs_chapter_2_Ирни, что ты несёшь?!: Irni, what are you talking about?!
dialogs_chapter_2_Ребята! Рикард вызывае:
Guys! Ricard calls the whole squad to his side!\.
We need to hurry!
dialogs_chapter_2_Мда\\..\\..\\.. Ты не:
Hmm\..\..\.. You never cease to amaze me, Irni.\.
First, you with Rosa caused a mayhem in the world 
of the Living, and now Purgatory has also suffered from 
your drunkenness.
dialogs_chapter_2_Хотя бы наш уговор не:
At least he didn’t break our agreement.
None of you were reported to me\..\..\..
And you didn’t catch my eye either.
dialogs_chapter_2_Та ладно тебе, Ирни. Н:
It's okay, Irni. Our new fighter doesn't know all the
details.\.\.
Ask, Riom.
dialogs_chapter_2_\\c[1]В чём суть ритуа: \c[1]What is the essence of the ritual?
dialogs_chapter_2_Конечно. Такое трудно: Certainly. It's hard not to notice.
dialogs_chapter_2_После посвящения Розы,:
After the initiation of Rose, I gave Irni one simple
condition - booze should not leave traces neither 
here nor in the world of the Living.
dialogs_chapter_2_Но сама задумка мне по:
But I liked the idea itself. So, as long as Irni
doesn't violate the main condition - the ritual will exist.
dialogs_chapter_2_В чём суть этого ритуа: What is the essence of this ritual?
This ritual\..\..\.. is the key to freedom of thought.
dialogs_chapter_2_Личность.\\.\\. Индиви:
Personality.\.\. Individuality.\.\. Freedom.\.\.
Many of us die without knowing the essence of 
these words.
dialogs_chapter_2_Отвечая на твой вопрос:
To answer your question. \.Dummies in my ranks
die like flies. This ritual helps to manifest
your hidden nature.
dialogs_chapter_2_Обретя личность ты отк:
By gaining personality, you will open up new 
opportunities, and this is the key to true freedom for 
the reaper.
dialogs_chapter_2_Со временем, ты поймёш:
In time, you will understand what I'm talking about, 
Riom.
dialogs_chapter_2_Тогда\\..\\..\\.. Риту:
Then\..\..\.. The ritual is successfully completed. 
Everybody's Free.
dialogs_chapter_2_И где же мне искать Ир: And where should I look for Irni?
dialogs_chapter_2_Риом, пожалуйста потор:
Riom, please hurry up! We have a problem\..\..\..
Approach the dorm next to the equipment depot in
North-Eastern region.
dialogs_chapter_2_*Риом почувствовал, ка:
*Riom felt his lungs fill with water,
                           but there was no shortage of air*
dialogs_chapter_2_От недостатка воздуха?:
From lack of air?\!
Ha ha! No.
dialogs_chapter_2_Такая мелочь никого из:
Such a little thing won’t kill any of us.\.
Be it a reaper, a demon, an angel or any other 
resident of the world of the dead.
dialogs_chapter_2_Говоришь, одежда не по: You say the clothes don't fit\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Да, плащ намертво приш: Yes, the raincoat is tightly sewn to the jacket.
dialogs_chapter_2_*Лаурита положила руку: *Laurita put her hand on Riom's chest*
dialogs_chapter_2_Чуть громче, чем у ост:
A little louder than the others\..\..\..\!
Close your eyes for a second.
dialogs_chapter_2_Знаешь\\..\\..\\.. Мал:
You know\..\..\.. Few of us, before we die, to know 
anything human. Feelings\..\..\.. Emotions\..\..\..
You have everything. You can feel.\.
To be happy, to be sad.
dialogs_chapter_2_Тебе не нужно находитс:
You don't have to be on the verge of death to
feel alive.
dialogs_chapter_2_Лаурита прижилась побл:
Laurita snuggled closer and brought her lips 
to Riom's ear.
dialogs_chapter_2_(шепот) Это интересно:
(whispers) It's interesting and scary at the same 
time. Many reapers are afraid of you, especially
in the punitive corps.
dialogs_chapter_2_(шепот) Рикард больше:
(whispers) Ricard wants nothing more than to get 
rid of you, in any way possible.
dialogs_chapter_2_(шепот) Все наши коман:
(whispers) All our commanders, High Reapers and
the rest\..\..\.. They all gradually descend from
mind. It's just a matter of time before the whole 
system collapses.
dialogs_chapter_2_(шепот) Чш-ш\\..\\..\\:
(whispers) Shh\..\..\.. I'm afraid to tell them the truth.
I don’t want to become like people and create a rift
among us.
dialogs_chapter_2_(шепот) Карательный ко:
(whispers) The punitive corps is nothing without 
Ricard, and he only knows how to kill.
dialogs_chapter_2_(шепот) Сами каратели:
(whisper) The punishers themselves imagine 
themselves as masters and do whatever they want.
dialogs_chapter_2_(шепот) История с Рито:
(whispers) The story with Rita is not an isolated 
incident. This has happened ten times and will 
happen again.
dialogs_chapter_2_(шепот) Пока Рикард по:
(whisper) As long as Ricard is useful, Lady Death
will not drive him away.
dialogs_chapter_2_(шепот) Помоги мне ост:
(whispers) Help me stop this bastard,
before he hurts us even more.
dialogs_chapter_2_(шепот) Подумай над эт:
(whisper) Think about it while you follow
their orders\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_А пока расслабься и по: In the meantime, relax and feel free.\.
dialogs_chapter_2_Лаурита приставила ука:
Laurita put her index finger to her lips.
A gesture hinting that Riom should remain silent.
dialogs_chapter_2_Тихие, умиротворяющие:
Quiet, calming waves\..\..\.. they help me
calm down no matter what happens.
dialogs_chapter_2_Какие у тебя обязаннос: What are your responsibilities as a commander?
dialogs_chapter_2_Что делаешь в свободно: What do you do in your free time?
dialogs_chapter_2_Каратели больше не дос: Are the punishers no longer annoying?
dialogs_chapter_2_Чем ты занимаешься как:
What do you do as a commander?
What are your responsibilities?
dialogs_chapter_2_Хм. \\.Тебе правда инт:
Hmm. Are you really interested in knowing this?
Have you ever seen the work of commanders?
dialogs_chapter_2_В отличие от этих люби:
Unlike these lovers of massacres,
I don’t have to draw my weapon.
dialogs_chapter_2_В основном я занимаюсь:
I'm mainly involved in monitoring treatment of
wounded troops. \.
My task is to bring everyone who suffered 
back to normal in any way.
dialogs_chapter_2_А если жнеца чем-то за:
And if the reaper was infected with something, 
cursed or inflicted the wound in a very specific way,
then I’m trying to understand together with your 
mother, how to cure it.
dialogs_chapter_2_Точно\\..\\..\\.. Белл:
Exactly\..\..\.. Bella Ruri, Werolomger manager
of medical corps.
dialogs_chapter_2_Она вроде как выполняе:
She seems to be doing some complicated
mission in the world of the Living.
dialogs_chapter_2_Давненько её не видел\: I haven't seen her for a long time\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Задачи у Высших жнецов:
The tasks of the High Reapers are not easy, so
they can drag on for years.
dialogs_chapter_2_И ещё меня иногда беру:
And sometimes they take me on hikes far beyond
the limits of Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_2_Что ты делаешь в свобо:
What are you doing in your free time?
When it's quiet and there are no important things 
to do.
dialogs_chapter_2_Когда важных дел нет,:
When there are no important things to do, I read and
practice synthesis of substances. I love hanging out 
with Dina at dining room or doing work in the world 
of the Living.
dialogs_chapter_2_Интересно, чем мы могл:
I wonder what we could do once
we get Purgatory business done.
dialogs_chapter_2_Я не против прогулятьс:
I don't mind walking around the world of people.\.
Let's steal a couple of bottles of “serum” from Dina 
and her for one thing.
dialogs_chapter_2_Каратели тебя больше н: Are the punishers not bothering you anymore?
dialogs_chapter_2_Виновников убийства мо:
The perpetrators of the murder of my squad were 
never found.
dialogs_chapter_2_И хоть под “взором жне:
And even though under the “gaze of the reaper” 
I am honest about everything answered\..\..\.. 
Suspicions are still valid.
dialogs_chapter_2_Пока каратели не найду:
Until the punitive forces find the killers and punish 
them - I'm under surveillance.
It turns out\..\..\.. We've dealt with half of
affairs.
dialogs_chapter_2_Ага, с тем придурком,:
Yeah, with that idiot, Krais Schneiden, already
former commander of the punitive forces.
dialogs_chapter_2_Его приказ убить меня:
His order to kill me was canceled, but the matter is 
not yet closed\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Пусть наблюдают за мно: Let them watch me as much as they want.
dialogs_chapter_2_И что делает этот меха: And what does this mechanism do?
dialogs_chapter_2_Эти лучи сканируют тел:
These rays scan the body and show the condition
of your insides, nerves, blood vessels and so on.
dialogs_chapter_2_Всё то, что при обычно: All that is not visible during a normal examination.
dialogs_chapter_2_Вплоть до того, что у: Right down to what's wrong with your soul.
dialogs_chapter_2_Риом из-зо всех сил сж:
Riom squeezes his hand with all his might, but 
it turned out the usual handshake.
dialogs_chapter_2_Мое тело создали с неб:
My body was created with a slight nervous defect
system, in the biceps area.
dialogs_chapter_2_Так что я не могу напр: So I can't strain my hands.
My condolences\..\..\.. How do you fight then?
Without muscle tension, the blows will be very weak.
dialogs_chapter_2_Я полагаюсь на скорост:
I rely on speed, quality of weapons and other 
muscles. Somehow it works out.
dialogs_chapter_2_Рита прижала пальцы к: Rita pressed her fingers to Riom's neck.
dialogs_chapter_2_Рита положила ладонь н: Rita put her hand on her torso, where her heart is.
Rita put her hand on her stomach.
dialogs_chapter_2_Рита на миг остановило:
Rita stopped for a moment, but then slowly began to 
lower hand lower.
dialogs_chapter_2_Т-так, пока что никаки: S-so, so far there are no serious problems.
dialogs_chapter_2_У тебя отсутствует чув:
You lack the sensitivity of your inner
organs. You can still feel pain and touch
but the rest is a problem.
dialogs_chapter_2_Рита достает из ящика:
Rita takes out two circle-shaped mechanisms from 
the box.
dialogs_chapter_2_То что обычно редко ис:
What is usually rarely used in our
medicine. Neuro-fixer. \.
It will return your nerves to their previous state.
dialogs_chapter_2_И часто ты лечишь подо: And do you often treat something like this?
dialogs_chapter_2_Нет. От разложения нер:
No. From the decomposition of the nervous system, 
people quickly go crazy or become controlled by 
external strength.
dialogs_chapter_2_Для меня подобное во в: This is the second time this has happened for me.
dialogs_chapter_2_Риом мигом сбросил с с:
Riom instantly threw off his cloak and exposed his 
torso.
dialogs_chapter_2_(шепотом) Хм\\..\\..\\:
(whispers) Hmm\..\..\.. for the rest they are not
made a mistake\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Рита подключила устрой: Rita connected the device to Riom's body.
dialogs_chapter_2_Из руки Риты появился:
A green beam appeared from Rita's hand. 
She directed it straight to the device.
dialogs_chapter_2_Какой-то странный кокт:
Some strange cocktail of emotions\..\..\..
And, yes, now everything has fallen into place.
dialogs_chapter_2_Риом проходится по тем:
Riom walks over the same places where Rita 
touched him.
dialogs_chapter_2_Теперь слышу. Чувствит: Now I hear it. Sensitivity has returned.
dialogs_chapter_2_Отлично, теперь можно:
Great, now we can confidently say - you are
healthy.
dialogs_chapter_2_Ты не использовала эне:
You didn't use Hydrite's energy, ingot\..\..\..
Not a single healing technology. And the words of 
Ricard, it's like you spoke something
in demonic language\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Но, за то что ты спас:
But, for the fact that you saved me, I’ll tell you 
something.
dialogs_chapter_2_Рита протягивает Риому: Rita extends her hand to Riom.
dialogs_chapter_2_Обещай мне, что всё чт:
Promise me that everything you hear will remain
between us.
dialogs_chapter_2_Если решишь рассказать:
If you decide to tell anyone my secrets,
without my permission\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Вся твоя нервная и кро:
Your entire nervous and circulatory systems
will collapse and you will choke on your own blood.
dialogs_chapter_2_Рита протыкает длинной:
Rita pierces her and Riom's hands with a long 
needle.
dialogs_chapter_2_На миг Риом заметил, к:
For a moment, Riom noticed how the veins on his 
pierced arms lit up. orange light. A second later - 
white, and then returned to normal.
dialogs_chapter_2_Это сейчас был демонич: Was this a demonic ritual now?\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Да. Твой вопрос, о том: Yes. Your question is about who I am.
dialogs_chapter_2_Не бойся, я не демон п:
Don't be afraid, I'm not a demon disguised as 
a reaper. But there is something demonic in me.
dialogs_chapter_2_Рита оголила спину до: Rita bared her back to the waist.
dialogs_chapter_2_У девушки весь позвоно:
The girl’s entire spine is covered with a dark orange 
tint. The spinal discs glow bright yellow.
dialogs_chapter_2_Значит ты - дьяволикий:
So you are the devil reaper?
By yourself, you do not serve either Hell or 
Purgatory?
dialogs_chapter_2_Мимо. \\!Я всё ещё жне:
Miss. \!
I am still a reaper and, just like everyone else, 
I serve our madam.
dialogs_chapter_2_Как-то раз я столкнула:
I once encountered a real succubus in the world of 
the Living.
dialogs_chapter_2_И она\\..\\..\\.. обуч:
And she\..\..\.. taught me the demonic
treatment technique.
dialogs_chapter_2_Правда для этого пришл:
It’s true that we had to implement a little
demon flesh into my body, as I saw it myself.
dialogs_chapter_2_Мне заменили позвоночн:
They replaced my spine and combined the demon 
blood with the reaper blood, so that no one 
notices anything.
dialogs_chapter_2_Иногда я слышу голоса:
Sometimes I hear voices from the Underworld, 
but they don't have any effect on me.
dialogs_chapter_2_Рита, ты играешь в опа: Rita, you are playing dangerous games with magic\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Почему ты согласилась: Why did you agree to this?
dialogs_chapter_2_Я слишком слаба и мало: I'm too weak and I can't do much.
dialogs_chapter_2_В критической ситуации:
In a critical situation there is no help from me\..\..\.. 
I don’t want to die just like
the rest of the Rivalsers.
dialogs_chapter_2_От удара по голове, ка:
From a blow to the head, some punisher or
devastator.
dialogs_chapter_2_Если сделка с демоном:
If a deal with a demon helps me survive and
save as many of your brothers as possible
reapers\..\..\.. then I’ll go after her.
dialogs_chapter_2_Ладно. На пока мы зако:
OK. We're done for now.
If you have no more questions for me, then
You can go.
And once again, thank you\..\..\.. To you and Kenchiru.
dialogs_chapter_2_Не стоит привлекать к: You shouldn't attract his attention to yourself.
dialogs_chapter_2_\\..\\..\\.. от рук Па:
\..\..\..all the reapers died at the hands of the 
executioner on the borders of Silver Desert and 
Jagged Canyon.
dialogs_chapter_2_«Они покрыты толстой б:
They are covered with thick carapace-type armor\..\..\..
Armed with two-handed axes\..\..\..
Madness is their main weapon\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Последнее, что успел с:
The last thing the fallen scout managed to say was
in the report.
dialogs_chapter_2_Опустошители развивают: devastators are evolving day by day.
dialogs_chapter_2_Раньше на вылазки отпр:
Previously, small groups of reapers went on 
forays.
dialogs_chapter_2_Теперь хорошо вооружён:
Now a well-armed detachment is hardly capable to 
handle a dozen devastators.
dialogs_chapter_2_И по этой причине все: And for this reason, all tasks are limited.
dialogs_chapter_2_Вылазки будут проводит:
The forays will be led by Werolomgers, and the 
remaining reapers will continue do their job in the 
world of people\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Пока поднятая Восставш: Until the storm raised by the Risen subsides.
By the way, about the Risen.
dialogs_chapter_2_Штаб Вероломгеров подо:
Werolomgers Headquarters suspects that they have 
taken refuge in the Jagged Canyon Mountains.
dialogs_chapter_2_И перед тем, как отпра:
And before sending punitive
The squad needs to conduct reconnaissance of the 
area.
Don't worry\..\..\.. you won’t have to fight the 
Risen.
dialogs_chapter_2_Как только заметим зел:
As soon as we notice the green-eyed bastards - 
\.\.immediately we're retreating.
dialogs_chapter_2_И последнее, состав от:
And lastly, the composition of the squad: Riom Ruri, 
Kenchiru, 8 other Rivalsers, and me as commander.
dialogs_chapter_2_Отряд собирается у гла:
The squad is gathering at the main teleport.\.\!
Do not be late!
dialogs_chapter_2_Стоит проверить комнат:
It's worth checking Weiler's room.
Maybe there are some clues there?
dialogs_chapter_2_Привет! Тут Вейлер не: Hello! Didn't Weiler pass by here?
dialogs_chapter_2_Вейлер\\..\\..\\.. Да,: Weiler\..\..\.. Yes, it seems like this guy came in\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Скажи, пожалуйста, в к:
Please tell me which of the two departments he went 
to?
dialogs_chapter_2_А этого я точно не пом:
I don’t remember this for sure\..\..\..
Most likely in the “Literary Department”, it is located
behind you, second turn on the left.
dialogs_chapter_2_День добрый! Я тут ищу:
Good afternoon! I'm here looking for Reaper Weiler.\!
I was told that he came into the literary department.
Do you know anything about him?

Good afternoon! I’m here looking for Reaper Weiler.
Have you heard anything about this?
dialogs_chapter_2_Здравствуй, жнец. Не х:
Hello, reaper. Would you like to introduce yourself 
first?
dialogs_chapter_2_Я Риом Рури. А тебя ка: I'm Riom Ruri. And what is your name?
dialogs_chapter_2_Дина, ривальсер мед-ко: Dina, revalcer of the medical corps.
dialogs_chapter_2_Вейлер\\..\\..\\.. Эх-:
Weiler\..\..\.. Eh-h\..\..\.. Yes, he came here, looking 
for information about the First Reaper.
dialogs_chapter_2_А после\\..\\..\\.. Он:
And after\..\..\.. He began to behave strangely and 
headed to the exit. He was scared of something\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Та не, бред какой-то!:
No, it’s some kind of nonsense! Don’t exaggerate!\!
A true reaper cannot feel fear!
dialogs_chapter_2_Если хорошо постаратьс: If you try hard, they can.
dialogs_chapter_2_Пора бы заглянуть к Зе:
It's time to visit Zed at the Werolomgers' 
headquarters.
dialogs_chapter_2_Стоит проверить литера:
It's worth checking out the literary department\..\..\..
What frightened Weiler so much?
dialogs_chapter_2_Или можно наведаться к:
Or I can go to his room.
Maybe there will be something useful there?
dialogs_chapter_2_Дина выглядит раздражё: Dina looks irritated, don't bother her just yet.
dialogs_chapter_2_И так, я в архиве\\..\:
And so, I’m in the archive\..\..\.. 
There are two departments here: literary and technical.\.\.
Which one was Weiler in?
dialogs_chapter_2_На одной из полок Риом:
Riom finds a remarkable book on one of the shelves.
The Legend of the First Reaper Pelagius.
dialogs_chapter_2_Из плоти и крови самой:
From the flesh and blood of Death itself he came - 
Pelagius, the first among the reapers.
He was endowed with limitless potential in the use 
of magic and could create structures.
dialogs_chapter_2_Перед Первым жнецом См:
Death set 2 goals for the First Reaper:
The first is to gain knowledge by traveling between 
the worlds of the Dead and Living.
dialogs_chapter_2_Вторая - создать крепо:
The second is to create a fortress that will become 
a tomb for Death and a center for the distribution 
of souls between Heaven and Hell.
dialogs_chapter_2_Путешествуя в мире Жив:
Traveling in the world of the Living, Pelagius saw 
a lot: wars and truces, cataclysms, fall and rise of 
countries, birth life and its death\..\..\.. the balance
of life and death and what it leaves behind.
dialogs_chapter_2_Мир Мертвых был не так:
The world of the Dead was not as favorable as the 
world of people. It was here that Pelagius first used 
his staff as a weapon.
dialogs_chapter_2_Пелагий скитался по вс:
Pelagius wandered throughout the world of the 
Dead, trying to find Quite a strong source of energy.
dialogs_chapter_2_Жнец побывал в разных:
The Reaper has visited various places, from the Dark Forest,
the place inexplicable phenomena and the monastery of guards,
to Hell, the refuge sinful souls and the lair of the most dangerous 
inhabitants of the world of the Dead - demons.
dialogs_chapter_2_Стоило Пелагию пройти:
As soon as Pelagius passed by the Ash Veil, several
thousand demons led by Abbadon, one of the 
higher demons, declared a hunt for his soul.
dialogs_chapter_2_Несмотря на такую опас:
Despite this danger, Pelagius absorbed some
energy of the Underworld and quickly left the demon territory.
dialogs_chapter_2_Не успел Пелагий выдох:
Before Pelagius had time to exhale, Death ordered him to appear
to the city of Hierarchs - Paradise. Something terrible is coming 
and all angels with demigods are in combat readiness\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_2_Явившись перед своей г:
Appearing before his mistress, Pelagius told about everything that
happened to him on the way. Everything he understood and
learned, and also, that there is only one small step left before the 
creation of Purgatory - reliable and endlessly renewable source of energy.
dialogs_chapter_2_Смерть ещё некоторое в:
Death kept asking Pelagius for some time about what he
learned about the value of life, about the consequences, and 
about loving one's creation\..\..\.. And then she hugged and gave
the last order.
dialogs_chapter_2_В этот момент произошё:
At this moment, the First Cataclysm occurred. 
From the depths of the Abyss 12 judges, the most 
dangerous and powerful monsters, escaped throughout 
the world of the Dead.
dialogs_chapter_2_Они уничтожали всё на:
They destroyed everything in their path, without any purpose.
They killed everything they could reach.
dialogs_chapter_2_Иерархи были разбиты п:
The hierarchs were the first to be defeated. 
Having resisted, they were able to destroy 2 judges.
dialogs_chapter_2_Пелагий тоже принял в:
Pelagius also took part in this and on the way to the 
exit from Paradise faced the Authority, the lord of shadows, 
capable of controlling bodies of fallen Hierarchs and angels.
dialogs_chapter_2_Власть удалось оглушит: They managed to stun the authorities, but this is temporary.
dialogs_chapter_2_Через пару километров:
A couple of kilometers later, Pelagius met the 2nd Judge - Nightmare.

will have time to complete its task.

The fight against 2 Judges took too much strength and

A minute later, her body shattered into pieces. Some of the Judges
